response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your life.", "product_price": 950000}
